column4: Can anyone help me get a backup list of my packages? and my gpg keys?  I think my system is a bit thrashed, and I'm going to have to reinstall...
do you routinely back up your home directory?
I can get the home directory no problem...  I can get to it through windows...  I just need to get a list of my installed packages...  And my GPG keys if they aren't in the home dir...
